name: タップ De ぷる萌え！ 矢上玲
summary:
「玲」はコスプレ喫茶で働く
チャイナドレスのウェイトレス。
--
"REI" was dressing as a China style waitress,working for a cosplay tea house. She always serve costomer with ferver but today,she got a unexpected bold one who was about to turn the thing different....!?

When you tap her, she swings and you will
hear sweet and sarrow chirping.
Whatever you would like to do by using Hand!

Extra stage included
Please mind the sound.
Android 2.2 or later.
Requires Adobe AIR.
info:
